name: ⚡ Indiegogo Campaign Builder
description:
Meet the Indiegogo Campaign Builder ⚡ This powerful template helped our team reach #1 trending and raise over $2m on the crowdfunding platform.


Build your campaign in hours, not weeks. Keep designers, copywriters, and stakeholders on the same page.


Open-sourced for a limited time. If you find this useful, feel free to buy me a coffee ☕


Not affiliated with Indiegogo
